riskAnalysis.title: Risk Analysis
riskAnalysis.description: AI-powered analysis of your business profile against each matched regulation. Compliance gaps, deadlines, and penalty exposure categorized by severity.

newsletter.title: Regulation Newsletter
newsletter.description: Personalized email digest with changes to regulations relevant to your business.

recommendations.title: Recommendations
recommendations.description: Prioritized action list based on your scan results. Compliance steps, recommended insurance, and timeline.

Mobile.description: ComplyRadar is optimized as a dashboard experience. Please open on a larger screen.

impressumContent.title: Legal Notice
impressumContent.subtitle: Information pursuant to ยง 5 TMG
impressumContent.vatIdInfo: VAT identification number pursuant to ยง 27a UStG: [DE Number]
impressumContent.liabilityText: The contents of this application have been created with the utmost care. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the content. Use of the content is at the user's own risk. The information provided does not constitute legal advice.
impressumContent.copyrightText: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law.

datenschutzContent.title: Privacy Policy
datenschutzContent.subtitle: Information pursuant to Art. 13 GDPR
datenschutzContent.dataCollection: Collection and Processing of Personal Data
datenschutzContent.dataCollectionText: When using ComplyRadar, the following personal data is collected and processed:
datenschutzContent.dataPoints:
Email address (upon registration)
Password (stored encrypted)
Business data (as part of the compliance scan)
Usage data (time and frequency of scans)
datenschutzContent.purposeText: Your data is processed exclusively for providing the ComplyRadar service. The legal basis is Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR (performance of a contract).
datenschutzContent.storageText: Your data is stored on Supabase servers (EU region). Data is stored for the duration of your account usage. Upon account deletion, all personal data will be deleted within 30 days.
datenschutzContent.rightsText: You have the right to access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability, and objection. Contact us at datenschutz@complyradar.de.
datenschutzContent.cookiesText: ComplyRadar uses only technically necessary cookies for authentication. No tracking or marketing cookies are used.
datenschutzContent.changesText: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy to reflect changes in legal requirements or modifications to the service.
